messages.content: Help me make an etsy listing for some agarwood no filler incense from Assam. It's from a local crafts person Tajul Bakshi - he Sources agarwood from Nagaland Arunachal and Assam and is an expert craftsperson and distiller. He also uses agarwood dust to make high quality agarwood incense in small batches. We're selling them 31 sticks at a time which burn for about 15 mins and make it nice and easy for people to burn agarwood without needing any special equipment. It's made of agarwood powder and agar-agar as a binder for ingredients. Make me a high selling etsy listing you can use best practices found on Etsy and include things that Nur Creative Studio might say for this product packed in a nice cardboard box, it's ethical, bio, fair trade and personally sourced by me going to Assam and finding Tajul Bakshi who I love working with and believes in craftsmanship and ensuring Baraka is filling the products he sells

Title:
"Handcrafted Agarwood Incense Sticks by Tajul Bakshi - 100% Pure, No Filler, Ethically Sourced & Fair Trade (31 Sticks, 15-min Burn)"

Description:

Introducing our exclusive Handcrafted Agarwood Incense Sticks, lovingly created by expert craftsperson and distiller, Tajul Bakshi. Savor the divine fragrance of genuine agarwood with these luxurious incense sticks, perfect for creating a soothing and enchanting atmosphere in your home or sacred space.

üåø Ethically Sourced & Fair Trade
Our agarwood incense is sourced from the lush forests of Assam, Nagaland, and Arunachal by Tajul Bakshi himself, who is committed to ethical and sustainable practices. We're proud to offer you a fair trade product that supports local artisans and promotes environmental stewardship.

‚ú® Handcrafted with Love & Baraka
Each incense stick is meticulously crafted in small batches using agarwood powder and agar-agar as a binder. Tajul Bakshi infuses his creations with Baraka - a deep spiritual connection that ensures the highest quality and blessings in every product.

üî• Easy to Burn, No Special Equipment Required
Our incense sticks burn for approximately 15 minutes, allowing you to enjoy the mesmerizing aroma of agarwood without any hassle or special equipment.

üíö Eco-friendly & Sustainable Packaging
Your incense sticks will arrive in a beautiful, eco-friendly cardboard box that showcases the care and craftsmanship of this unique product. 

üì¶ What's Included:
- 31 handcrafted agarwood incense sticks (15-min burn time each)
- A lovely, environmentally friendly cardboard box

As a passionate supporter of local artisans and sustainable practices, I personally traveled to Assam to source these incense sticks from Tajul Bakshi, who I am proud to work with. Nur Creative Studio is committed to offering you products that are not only high-quality and delightful but also ethical, environmentally friendly, and fair trade.

Order your Handcrafted Agarwood Incense Sticks today and elevate your senses with the enchanting aroma of pure agarwood.

Please note: Due to the handcrafted nature of this product, there may be slight variations in appearance and scent. This only adds to the uniqueness and authenticity of your incense sticks.

Can you make another etsy post using a similar style yet not using any of the same sentences for Assam Green Tea coming from Herbaceous mineral flavor, slightly buttery.
Direct from Amalgamated Plantation, Assam, India. It's organic, green and we personally visited the farms directly amidst the Kaziranga National Park is a national park in the Golaghat and Nagaon districts of the state of Assam, India. where we saw wild elephants and Rhinos

Title:
"Organic Assam Green Tea - Herbaceous & Buttery Flavor, Sustainably Sourced from Amalgamated Plantation (Kaziranga National Park, India)"

Description:

Introducing our exquisite Organic Assam Green Tea, boasting a delightful herbaceous, mineral-rich flavor with a touch of buttery smoothness. Sourced directly from the pristine Amalgamated Plantation in Assam, India, our tea is a testament to the natural beauty and bounty of the region.

üçÉ Organic & Green
Our Assam Green Tea is cultivated using organic farming methods, ensuring a pure and pesticide-free experience that's gentle on both you and the environment.

üåø Sustainably Sourced from Amalgamated Plantation
Nestled amidst the breathtaking Kaziranga National Park, home to wild elephants and rhinos, our tea comes from the Amalgamated Plantation. This idyllic location in the Golaghat and Nagaon districts of Assam provides a truly unique terroir for our green tea.

üåè Direct Farm-to-Cup Experience
We personally visited the farms within Kaziranga National Park, ensuring a close relationship with the tea growers and a direct farm-to-cup experience for our customers.

üéÅ Perfect Gift for Tea Lovers
This exceptional Assam Green Tea makes a thoughtful gift for tea enthusiasts or anyone who appreciates the finer things in life.

üì¶ What's Included:
- Premium Organic Assam Green Tea (choose your preferred weight from the dropdown menu)
- Beautiful, eco-conscious packaging

Indulge in the enchanting flavors of our Organic Assam Green Tea, a true testament to the natural splendor of Assam, India. Order your tea today and treat yourself or a loved one to a truly extraordinary tea experience.

Please note: Due to the organic and natural cultivation of our tea, there may be slight variations in taste and appearance. This only adds to the authenticity and uniqueness of your tea.

Tags:
Organic Green Tea, Assam Tea, Sustainably Sourced, Amalgamated Plantation, Kaziranga National Park, India, Herbaceous Flavor, Buttery Tea, Eco Friendly, Wildlife, Direct from Farm, Tea Gift, Unique Terroir
